hints.content:
We start at $3{:}42$ when Yasemin starts her project.

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 3:40 to 4:40 with tick marks at every 1 minute. The tick marks at 3:40, 3:50, 4:00, 4:10, 4:20, 4:30, and 4:40 are labeled. A red circle appears on the  unlabeled tick mark at 3:42. !

hints.content:
To determine what time Yasemin finishes her project, we go **right** ${50}$ minutes from $3{:}42$.

[[☃ image 1]]

$\begin{align}
{3{:}42} +{} &\goldE{3}\text{ minutes} = 3{:}45\\\\
{3{:}45} +{} &\purpleD{15}\text{ minutes} = 4{:}00\\\\
4{:}00 +{} & \greenD{30}\text{ minutes} = {4{:}30} \\\\
4{:}30 +{} &\redD{2}\text{ minutes} = \blueD{4{:}32}
\end{align}$

options.alt: A number line labeled 3:40 to 4:40 with tick marks at every 1 minute. The tick marks at 3:40, 3:50, 4:00, 4:10, 4:20, 4:30, and 4:40 are labeled. A series of four arrows are shown moving left to right from the 3:42 tick mark to the 4:32 tick mark. The first arrow starts at the 3:42  tick mark and ends at the 3:45 tick mark and is labeled plus 3. The second arrow starts at the 3:45 tick mark and ends at the 4:00 tick mark and is labeled plus 15. The third arrow starts at the 4:00 tick mark and ends at the 4:30 tick mark and is labeled plus 30. The fourth arrow starts at the 4:30 tick mark and ends at the 4:32 tick mark and is labeled plus 2. !

hints.content:
Yasemin finished her project at $\blueD{4{:}32} $.  

Which clock shows $\blueD{4{:}32}$?

When Yasemin finishes her project, the clock shows:

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 4 and 5 and the long hand on the second tick mark after 6. !

question.content:
It takes Yasemin $50$ minutes to complete her history project.  Yasemin starts her project at $3{:}42 \text { p.m.}$

**What time does the clock show when Yasemin finishes her project?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand on the 4 and the long hand on the 10.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/89f4d8ddce50acaa9b047044f95c416cdb802cd1)

![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 4 and 5 and the long hand on the second tick mark after 6.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/aee4f24d0e8329d220de3fe062d3b512c5fd2052)

![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 4 and 5 and the long hand on the second tick mark after 4.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/b7165738d12bfa167614b3ed5c4069f41a8a6472)
